name: Bullet Ship Goes Boom!
description:
Physics here are your enemy. Though quite hard to master the controls become very satisfactory once you do. 

A and D to steer, spacebar to Boost.

Press E for Easy Mode (easy physics).

Land VERY gently in order to not explode. You can land anywhere, but you only win if you land in the green pad.

Death is only the beginning because dying is the first thing you'll do in this game.
